author: April
content:
I absolutely love both the images in this post.  At first I thought the second was an album cover for your "Song of the Day" -- maybe from Pink Floyd's "The Wall". ðŸ™‚  Beautifully strong colors, textures, layers and reveals.

Your point of view in creating the first image is brilliant, IMHO, and it's a delight to be brought along for the ride.
